entry.title: Introduction
entry.content:
Thank you for coming to my website. I appreciate that you took the time to read something that could be meaningless (yet entertraining) or useful in your everyday lives.

Remember the butterfly effect (Chaos Theory): Something as small as the flutter of a butterfly's wings, can ultimately cause a typhoon halfway across the world. 

This is my attempt to have some sort of positive energy sent out to our virtual world. 

Enjoy!
